å®ç°äº†ä¸€ä¸‹æ–‡ä¸­æåˆ°çš„å¼€ç¯çš„ä¾‹å­ã€‚

public interface ButtonServer {
void turnOn();
void turnOff();
}

class Lamp implements ButtonServer {
public void turnOn() {
System.out.println("Lamp On");
}

public void turnOff() {
System.out.println("Lamp Off");
}
}

class Button {
ButtonServer bs;
public void Button(ButtonServer buttonServer) {
bs = buttonServer;
}
public void poll() {
bs.turnOff();
bs.turnOn();
}
}
